Expand computer hard drive storage instantly! Add extra storage to your Desktop PC / Laptop Without opening up the case
Perfect for hard drive expansion and backup storage for your entire Windows OS system! (Do it before it crash, you never know when it will happen! "Daily schedule backup is no longer optional" )
body.description: Avolusion PRO-5X Series 14TB (14-Terabyte) External Hard Drive is the value hard drive upgrade kit provides the best and easy solution to expand your Desktop PC / Laptop storage capacity instantly! Plug and Play USB 3.0 interface providing a perfect portable storage solution for you to store & backup your game data, music, picture, video and more! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive designed to work with your Windows OS Desktop PC, Laptop perfectly! Fully compatible with any Windows OS devices. It comes with silent fan-less design to keep your External Hard Drive operate quietly! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive Upgrade Kit features high-quality construction, advanced external interface technology, durable chassis and state-of-the-art industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable performance. Features: UPC: 810064872297Model: PRO5X-WH-14TB-WIN Built-in 14TB Capacity Hard Drive Compatible with Windows 11, 10, 8, 7 Windows NTFS File System Pre-Formatted Expand computer hard drive storage instantly! Add extra storage to your Desktop PC / Laptop Without opening up the case Specification: Interface: USB 3.0 Built-In Capacity : 14TB Material: Plastic/PVC USB Data Speed: 5.0 Gbit/s Support Platform: Windows OS Color: White Dimension: 8"(L) x 5"(W) x 1.6"(H) Power Input: 100V ~ 240V (50-60Hz 0.8A) Power Output: 12V 2.0A Package Contents: Avolusion PRO-5X 14TB External Storage (Windows OS) USB 3.0 Cable Power Adapter User Manual 2 Years Warranty

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 13 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality external hard disk, reasonable price, 2 year warranty.
reviews.reviewText: I like this external hard disk, going to buy more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Out of the box ready, huge capacity, silent, on/off switch 4/5
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deal. Huge capacity, totally quiet, and with an on/off switch, attractive case, small desktop footprint. Everything going for it.So far seems like a great deal, and it has got to be a major feat to break into a market dominated by big names such as Western Digital, Seagate, Toshiba, etc.The big question is its reliability and performance over the long term. Guess we'll find that out over time, and if it fails I will come back here and drop the rating, if not, I will raise it to 5/5.A very impressive product with great price. 4/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Drive size much smaller than adverised
reviews.reviewText: So far works good and for the price I am happy. I was more than a little annoyed when I plugged it in and my computer recognized a 12.7 TB drive. Granted they are always smaller than reported but almost one and half TB is ridiculous. It is going to do what I need and with a two year warranty will hopefully get me to the time where SSD drive sizes catch up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Crashed after a week or so.
